Unnamed Group of People.Sourced Statement: We had a job fair in the middle of a heat wave and there was still a line going out of the door.
Unnamed Group of People.Source Justification: The text refers to attendees of a job fair at the Tobyhanna Army Depot, illustrating the high demand for jobs in the defense manufacturing sector.

Unnamed Group of People.Sourced Statement: We had another one when it was pouring rain, and the same thing happened.
Unnamed Group of People.Source Justification: The text refers to attendees of a job fair at the Tobyhanna Army Depot, illustrating the high demand for jobs in the defense manufacturing sector.

Named Person Sources.Sourced Statement: We’re all about quality jobs, and that’s a quality organization.
Named Person Sources.Title of Source: President and Chief Executive Officer of the Scranton Chamber of Commerce
Named Person Sources.Source Justification: Bob Durkin is quoted to highlight the economic importance of the Scranton Army Ammunition Plant to the local community.

Named Person Sources.Sourced Statement: So the infusion of additional funding to support is important to us.
Named Person Sources.Title of Source: President and Chief Executive Officer of the Scranton Chamber of Commerce
Named Person Sources.Source Justification: Bob Durkin is quoted to highlight the economic importance of the Scranton Army Ammunition Plant to the local community.

Named Person Sources.Sourced Statement: It’s not $277 million that stays here. But, you know, it’s a good chunk of it.
Named Person Sources.Title of Source: Congressman representing Scranton and other parts of Northeastern Pennsylvania
Named Person Sources.Source Justification: Matt Cartwright is quoted to emphasize the economic impact of defense contracts on the local economy.

Named Person Sources.Sourced Statement: And it’s important that we keep that work coming.
Named Person Sources.Title of Source: Congressman representing Scranton and other parts of Northeastern Pennsylvania
Named Person Sources.Source Justification: Matt Cartwright is quoted to emphasize the economic impact of defense contracts on the local economy.

Named Person Sources.Sourced Statement: I don’t really think that people dwell or concentrate on anything that’s going on outside of their sphere of influence.
Named Person Sources.Title of Source: Commander’s Representative at the Scranton Army Ammunition Plant
Named Person Sources.Source Justification: Rich Hansen is quoted to provide insight into the focus of workers at the Scranton Army Ammunition Plant.

Named Person Sources.Sourced Statement: We’re kind of busy concentrating on what’s going on in Scranton.
Named Person Sources.Title of Source: Commander’s Representative at the Scranton Army Ammunition Plant
Named Person Sources.Source Justification: Rich Hansen is quoted to provide insight into the focus of workers at the Scranton Army Ammunition Plant.

Named Person Sources.Sourced Statement: With the Ukraine support, you know, one day I was sitting there thinking about what needs to be done, and it kind of hit me that what we were doing directly affects whether people live or die.
Named Person Sources.Title of Source: Senior Technology Center Engineer at the Tobyhanna Army Depot
Named Person Sources.Source Justification: Jim Jarick is quoted to highlight the critical importance of the work being done at the Tobyhanna Army Depot.

Named Person Sources.Sourced Statement: If we aren’t doing our job correctly, people could die tomorrow. And that just put this whole thing in perspective for me.
Named Person Sources.Title of Source: Senior Technology Center Engineer at the Tobyhanna Army Depot
Named Person Sources.Source Justification: Jim Jarick is quoted to highlight the critical importance of the work being done at the Tobyhanna Army Depot.

Named Person Sources.Sourced Statement: At the height of last year’s counteroffensive, the Ukrainians were firing about 6,000 a day.
Named Person Sources.Title of Source: Senior Advisor at the Center for Strategic and International Studies
Named Person Sources.Source Justification: Mark Cancian is quoted to provide expert analysis on the scale of artillery usage in the Ukraine conflict.

Named Person Sources.Sourced Statement: The Russians are [firing] probably about 10,000 a day.
Named Person Sources.Title of Source: Senior Advisor at the Center for Strategic and International Studies
Named Person Sources.Source Justification: Mark Cancian is quoted to provide expert analysis on the scale of artillery usage in the Ukraine conflict.

Named Person Sources.Sourced Statement: Our first task is to save our people.
Named Person Sources.Title of Source: Commander of a Ukrainian artillery unit
Named Person Sources.Source Justification: Col. Olksandr Popov is quoted to emphasize the critical need for artillery shells in Ukraine's defense efforts.

Named Person Sources.Sourced Statement: Without artillery, we cannot do this.
Named Person Sources.Title of Source: Commander of a Ukrainian artillery unit
Named Person Sources.Source Justification: Col. Olksandr Popov is quoted to emphasize the critical need for artillery shells in Ukraine's defense efforts.

Named Organization Sources.Sourced Statement: The Tobyhanna Army Depot, which specializes in logistics support and radar equipment for foreign allies such as Ukraine, estimates that the company has a $2.4 billion dollar impact on the area and that it is the largest industrial employer in the region.
Named Organization Sources.Source Justification: The Tobyhanna Army Depot is cited to illustrate its economic impact and role as a major employer in the region.

Named Organization Sources.Sourced Statement: Officials at Tobyhanna estimate that its average annual salary is $30,000 higher than the average salary in northeastern Pennsylvania, which is around $58,000 in 2021.
Named Organization Sources.Source Justification: The Tobyhanna Army Depot is cited to highlight the economic benefits of its operations for employees in the region.
